---
order: 5
zh-CN:
	title: 不使用TabPanel，只使用Tab展示导航
	tabOne: 选项一
	tabTwo: 选项二
	tabThree: 选项三
en-US:
	title: Tabs without using TabPanel
	tabOne: Tab One
	tabTwo: Tab Two
	tabThree: Tab Three
---

```jsx
import { Tabs } from 'zent';

class Simple extends Component {
	constructor(props) {
		super(props);

		this.state = {
			activeId: '2',
			tabs: [{
				title: '{i18n.tabOne}',
				key: '1',
				disabled: true
			}, {
				title: '{i18n.tabTwo}',
				key: '2'
			}, {
				title: '{i18n.tabThree}',
				key: '3'
			}]
		};
	}

	onTabChange(id) {
		this.setState({
			activeId: id
		});
	}
	
	render() {
		return (
			<div>
				<div style={{ marginTop: '10px' }}>
					<Tabs
						activeId={this.state.activeId}
						onTabChange={this.onTabChange.bind(this)}
						tabs={this.state.tabs} />
					<h1>{this.state.activeId}</h1>
				</div>
			</div>
		);
	}
}

ReactDOM.render(<Simple />, mountNode);
```
